description:
Video from NHK Anime Pavilion 2008 event that was held at NHK Minna no Hiroba Fureai Hall on 14 August 2008.
Talk with Kishio Daisuke (Jouslain Tytania`s VA), Konishi Katsuyuki (Fan Hyulick`s VA), Kondou Takashi (Aryabhata Tytania`s VA), Yoshino Hiroyuki (Idris Tytania`s VA) and Nazuka Kaori (Lydia`s VA) preceded by short introduction of ending song creators Yoffy and Imajo from Psychic Lover and opening song creator Takatori Hideaki.

titles.title: "NHK Anime Pavilion 2008" Talk Show - Part 2 of 2: Voice Actors` Talk
「NHKアニメ館2008」トークショー (後編・声優トーク)
